MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G65 postcode area of Kilsyth. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am due to a faulty high voltage transformer and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:42am on Friday, 23 October 2020
